description.zh-cn: 明朝初期将领，袭封曹国公。靖难之役时，为建文帝大将，屡败于燕王朱棣，后于南京开金川门投降。永乐年间被削爵圈禁，永乐末年去世。
description.en: A general in the early Ming Dynasty who inherited the title Duke of Cao. During the Jingnan Campaign, he served as a commander for the Jianwen Emperor but was repeatedly defeated by Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan. He later surrendered by opening the Jinchuan Gate in Nanjing. He was stripped of his title and placed under house arrest during the Yongle era, and died near the end of the Yongle reign.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国功臣，朱元璋的外甥，李景隆之父。
description.en: A founding general of the Ming Dynasty, nephew of Zhu Yuanzhang, and father of Li Jinglong.

description.zh-cn: 李景隆的弟弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Li Jinglong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝晋王，李景隆的女婿。
description.en: A Prince of Jin in the Ming Dynasty, son-in-law of Li Jinglong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝，明太祖。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming Dynasty, Emperor Taizu of Ming.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第二位皇帝，朱元璋之孙。在靖难之役中被其叔父朱棣击败，后下落不明。
description.en: The second emperor of the Ming Dynasty, grandson of Zhu Yuanzhang. He was defeated by his uncle Zhu Di in the Jingnan Campaign and his whereabouts after that are unknown.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第三位皇帝，朱元璋第四子。初封燕王，后发动靖难之役，夺取皇位。
description.en: The third emperor of the Ming Dynasty, the fourth son of Zhu Yuanzhang. Initially the Prince of Yan, he launched the Jingnan Campaign and seized the throne.

description.zh-cn: 明朝谷王，朱元璋之子。在靖难之役中与李景隆一同开金川门投降朱棣。
description.en: The Prince of Gu in the Ming Dynasty, a son of Zhu Yuanzhang. During the Jingnan Campaign, he and Li Jinglong opened the Jinchuan Gate to surrender to Zhu Di.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝时期的重要大臣，主张削藩，并推荐李景隆为大将军。
description.en: An important minister during the reign of the Jianwen Emperor, he advocated for reducing the power of the princes and recommended Li Jinglong as Grand General.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝时期的重要大臣，极力反对任命李景隆为大将军。
description.en: An important minister during the reign of the Jianwen Emperor, he strongly opposed the appointment of Li Jinglong as Grand General.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝麾下将领，作战勇猛。在围攻北平时几乎破城，但被李景隆阻止。后在白沟河之战中战死。
description.en: A valiant general under the Jianwen Emperor. He almost breached the walls of Beiping during a siege but was stopped by Li Jinglong. He was later killed in the Battle of Baigou River.

description.zh-cn: 建文帝时期的儒学大师和大臣，曾请求诛杀李景隆。
description.en: A renowned Confucian scholar and minister during the reign of the Jianwen Emperor who requested the execution of Li Jinglong.

description.zh-cn: 明朝周王，朱元璋之子。建文年间被李景隆逮捕，永乐年间又揭发李景隆。
description.en: The Prince of Zhou in the Ming Dynasty, a son of Zhu Yuanzhang. He was arrested by Li Jinglong during the Jianwen era and later accused Li Jinglong during the Yongle era.

description.zh-cn: 明朝将领，在李景隆兵败后接替其职位，继续抵抗燕军。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty general who replaced Li Jinglong after his defeat and continued to resist the Yan army.

description.zh-cn: 明朝初年，燕王朱棣以“清君侧”为名，起兵反对建文帝的内战。最终朱棣获胜，夺取皇位。
description.en: A civil war in the early Ming Dynasty where Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan, rebelled against the Jianwen Emperor under the pretext of 'clearing the court'. Zhu Di was ultimately victorious and seized the throne.

description.zh-cn: 靖难之役中的一场关键战役，李景隆率领的南军在此被朱棣的燕军击溃。
description.en: A key battle in the Jingnan Campaign where the southern army led by Li Jinglong was routed by Zhu Di's Yan army.

description.zh-cn: 靖难之役中的一场决定性战役，李景隆率领的六十万大军再次被朱棣击败，南军主力损失殆尽。
description.en: A decisive battle in the Jingnan Campaign where Li Jinglong's 600,000-strong army was again defeated by Zhu Di, leading to the near-total loss of the southern army's main force.

description.zh-cn: 靖难之役末期，李景隆与谷王朱橞打开南京金川门投降燕军，导致建文帝政权覆灭的事件。
description.en: An event at the end of the Jingnan Campaign where Li Jinglong and Prince Gu Zhu Hui opened Nanjing's Jinchuan Gate to surrender to the Yan army, leading to the collapse of the Jianwen Emperor's regime.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由朱元璋建立。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history established by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的世袭公爵爵位，初封予李文忠，后由其子李景隆继承。
description.en: A hereditary ducal title in the Ming Dynasty, first granted to Li Wenzhong and later inherited by his son, Li Jinglong.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代官职，负责辅导皇太子。
description.en: An ancient Chinese official title, responsible for tutoring the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 记载明太祖朱元璋统治时期事迹的官方史书。
description.en: The official historical record of the reign of Emperor Taizu of Ming (Zhu Yuanzhang).

description.zh-cn: 李景隆是李文忠的儿子。
description.en: Li Jinglong was the son of Li Wenzhong.

description.zh-cn: 李增枝是李景隆的弟弟。
description.en: Li Zengzhi was Li Jinglong's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 李景隆是朱元璋外甥李文忠的儿子，即朱元璋的外甥孙。
description.en: Li Jinglong was the son of Zhu Yuanzhang's nephew, Li Wenzhong, making him Zhu Yuanzhang's grandnephew.

description.zh-cn: 李景隆的女儿是朱济熿的正妃，因此朱济熿是李景隆的女婿。
description.en: Li Jinglong's daughter was the primary consort of Zhu Jihuang, making Zhu Jihuang his son-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 洪武十九年（1386年），李景隆继承其父李文忠的曹国公爵位。
description.en: In 1386 (the 19th year of the Hongwu reign), Li Jinglong inherited the title of Duke of Cao from his father, Li Wenzhong.

position.en: Grand Tutor to the Crown Prince

description.zh-cn: 李景隆曾掌管左军都督府事，并加太子太傅衔。
description.en: Li Jinglong was in charge of the Left Military Command and was also appointed Grand Tutor to the Crown Prince.

description.zh-cn: 李景隆奉诏担任《明太祖实录》的监修官。
description.en: Li Jinglong was ordered to serve as the supervising editor for the 'Veritable Records of Emperor Taizu of Ming'.

description.zh-cn: 在靖难之役期间，李景隆被建文帝任命为大将军，率领朝廷军队对抗燕王朱棣。
description.en: During the Jingnan Campaign, Li Jinglong was appointed Grand General by the Jianwen Emperor to lead the imperial army against Zhu Di, the Prince of Yan.

description.zh-cn: 在耿炳文战败后，黄子澄向建文帝举荐李景隆接任大将军。
description.en: After Geng Bingwen's defeat, Huang Zicheng recommended Li Jinglong to the Jianwen Emperor to take over as Grand General.

description.zh-cn: 齐泰极力反对黄子澄的提议，认为李景隆不能胜任大将军一职。
description.en: Qi Tai strongly opposed Huang Zicheng's proposal, believing that Li Jinglong was not competent for the position of Grand General.

description.zh-cn: 洪武三十一年（1398年）七月，李景隆奉命前往开封，将周王朱橚全家押回南京。
description.en: In July 1398, Li Jinglong was ordered to Kaifeng to arrest the Prince of Zhou, Zhu Su, and his entire family and escort them back to Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 在围攻北平时，都督瞿能几乎攻破张掖门，但李景隆因妒忌其功，命令他停止进攻，导致功败垂成。
description.en: During the siege of Beiping, Commander Qu Neng nearly breached the Zhangye Gate, but Li Jinglong, jealous of his potential success, ordered him to halt the attack, thwarting the effort.

description.zh-cn: 在郑村坝之战中，李景隆被朱棣率领的燕军击败，大败而逃，丧师十余万。
description.en: In the Battle of Zhengcunba, Li Jinglong was defeated by the Yan army led by Zhu Di and fled, losing over a hundred thousand troops.

description.zh-cn: 在白沟河之战中，李景隆的六十万大军再次被朱棣击败，辎重尽失，投降十万余人。
description.en: In the Battle of Baigou River, Li Jinglong's army of 600,000 was once again defeated by Zhu Di, losing all supplies and having over 100,000 men surrender.

description.zh-cn: 在白沟河之战中，将领瞿能及其子均战死。
description.en: In the Battle of Baigou River, General Qu Neng and his son were both killed in action.

description.zh-cn: 白沟河惨败后，建文帝下诏将李景隆召回，并以盛庸替代其大将军之职。
description.en: After the disastrous defeat at Baigou River, the Jianwen Emperor recalled Li Jinglong and replaced him as Grand General with Sheng Yong.

description.zh-cn: 李景隆兵败还京后，黄子澄在朝廷上抓住他，请求将其处死以谢天下。
description.en: After Li Jinglong returned to the capital in defeat, Huang Zicheng seized him at court and requested his execution to atone for his failures.

description.zh-cn: 燕军渡江后，方孝孺请求建文帝诛杀李景隆。
description.en: After the Yan army crossed the Yangtze River, Fang Xiaoru requested that the Jianwen Emperor execute Li Jinglong.

description.zh-cn: 燕军兵临南京城下时，李景隆与谷王朱橞一同打开金川门，迎接燕军入城。
description.en: When the Yan army reached the walls of Nanjing, Li Jinglong and Prince Gu Zhu Hui opened the Jinchuan Gate to welcome them into the city.

description.zh-cn: 燕军兵临南京城下时，谷王朱橞与李景隆一同打开金川门，迎接燕军入城。
description.en: When the Yan army reached the walls of Nanjing, Prince Gu Zhu Hui and Li Jinglong opened the Jinchuan Gate to welcome them into the city.

description.zh-cn: 金川门的打开使得朱棣的军队得以顺利进入南京，为其最终夺取皇位铺平了道路。
description.en: The opening of the Jinchuan Gate allowed Zhu Di's army to enter Nanjing smoothly, paving the way for him to ultimately seize the throne.

description.zh-cn: 金川门的打开标志着南京的陷落和建文帝政权的覆灭。
description.en: The opening of the Jinchuan Gate marked the fall of Nanjing and the collapse of the Jianwen Emperor's regime.

description.zh-cn: 永乐二年（1404年），在周王朱橚及群臣的弹劾下，朱棣下令削去李景隆的爵位，将其全家软禁。
description.en: In 1404, following accusations by Prince of Zhou Zhu Su and other officials, Zhu Di ordered that Li Jinglong be stripped of his title and his entire family placed under house arrest.

description.zh-cn: 永乐二年（1404年），周王朱橚揭发李景隆在建文年间收受贿赂之事，成为导致李景隆倒台的原因之一。
description.en: In 1404, the Prince of Zhou, Zhu Su, accused Li Jinglong of accepting bribes during the Jianwen era, which was one of the reasons for Li Jinglong's downfall.
